cast.name: 吉姆·艾尔-哈利利 Jim Al-Khalili

introduction: The central premise of this series is that what the human eye can see is only a fraction of the vast amount of matter and energy that exists out in the Universe: our best estimate is that more than 99% of all the stuff that’s out there is hidden in the dark. So how do we know it’s there?E1 Light: Professor Jim Al-Khalili tells the story of how we used light to reveal the cosmos.E2 Dark: Prof Jim Al-Khalili investigates the 99 per cent of the cosmos that is hidden in the dark.via:http://www.jimal-khalili.com/blog/light-and-dark-bbc4.htmlhttp://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p01k4ykj
